lead_paragraph: Mr. Caramanica compares Sarah McLachlan and Lady Gaga to show that pop music by women has moved from sincerity to spectacle.
snippet: Mr. Caramanica compares Sarah McLachlan and Lady Gaga to show that pop music by women has moved from sincerity to spectacle.

headline.main: Lady Gaga: When Surface Is Depth
headline.print_headline: Lady Gaga: When Surface Is Depth
